titles.title: CB 9 I Will Enter His Gates

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I WILL ENTER HIS GATES
With thanksgiving in my heart. I will enter His
courts with praise. I will say this is the day that
the Lord has made. I will rejoice for He has made
me glad.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
He has made me glad, He has made me glad.
I will rejoice for He has made me glad.
(Repeat)
